description: Ever feel as if you spend half your life in the car? Maximize your time with the Targus Mobile Charger for iPad, a DC auto charger, which charges your iPad, iPhone or iPod via your car? 12V outlet. Small and compact, this charger takes up very little space and comes in handy when you have forgotten to charge your iPad/iPhone/iPod at home. You can even charge other USB-charged devices with the appropriate cable (sold separately). Don't you wish you can be this efficient with everything else in life?
title: Targus Car Charger -DC for Apple iPad, iPad 2, iPad 3 and iPad 4th Generation, iPad mini, 16GB, 32GB, 64GB WiFi , 4G, iPhone, iPod APD04US -Black
